summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ocean Seller Dashboard with Arabic/English RTL support. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), frontend UI working excellently with proper bilingual support and responsive design.
passed_tests: Seller login with seller@ocean.com / seller123 (seller role)
Frontend login page loads correctly with language switcher
Dashboard page loads with Arabic RTL layout by default
Navigation to all pages: Products, Orders, Finance, Inventory, Promotions, Reviews, Settings
Language switching Arabic/English with proper RTL/LTR direction changes
Responsive design - mobile view working correctly
Products page displays existing products (Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Apple MacBook Pro M3)
Sidebar navigation and user profile display
Arabic translations working correctly throughout the application
Dashboard stats cards showing proper data
Finance page showing revenue, commission, and transaction data
Promotions page with coupons and flash sales tabs

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and navigation working perfectly)
